name: Spin Shooter
description:
Shoot enemies before they reach you in this fast-paced aim training game!!!

You are the little white circle in the middle.

Aim with the mouse, shoot with the left mouse button or the Z/X/C keys. Kill yourself with the ESC key :P

You have 3 HP and 60 seconds. The enemy spawn rate will increase over time. Different levels will have different enemy spawn rates.
